DOC.brief_summary: This study follow 2500 prevalent Chronic Kidney Disease ( CKD ) patient Glomerular Filtration Rate ( GFR ) 15-45 ml/min 30 month serial measurement every 6 month subsequent annual chart review 60 month . This observational study analyze demographic , clinical status , medication blood urine sample patient study conventional biochemical , hormonal metabolic parameter assess underlie biomarkers reflect process involved disease progression .
